quotes.author: Jim Elliot
quotes.quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.

quotes.author: R.W. Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.author: Voltaire
quotes.quote: I detest what you write, but I would give my life to make it possible for you to continue to write.

quotes.author: Nordstrom Employee Manual
quotes.quote: Rule #1: Use best judgement in all situations. There will be no additional rules.
